title: 94/608/EC: Commission Decision of 8 September 1994 amending Commission Decision 92/452/EEC establishing lists of embryo collection teams approved in third countries for export of bovine embryos to the Community
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 8 September 1994 amending Commission Decision 92/452/EEC establishing lists of embryo collection teams approved in third countries for export of bovine embryos to the Community (94/608/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Part 3 of the Annex to Decision 92/452/EEC is amended as follows: the following embryo collection team is added:
"" ID="1">'940H071> ID="2">Moulton Embryos> ID="3">Dr Virgil J. Brown'">
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 September 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 10. 10. 1989, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 53, 24. 2. 1994, p. 23.
(3) OJ No L 250, 29. 8. 1992, p. 40.
(4) OJ No L 176, 9. 7. 1994, p. 27.
